item.title: Salmon & Orzo Bake
item.description: Ingredients Feeds 2. Can easily be doubled to feed 4. 2 salmon filets 1/2 lb orzo (uncooked) 1.5 cups chicken/veggie broth 1/2 bunch asparagus 1/2 cup peas 1 cups fresh spinach 1.5 Tbsp parsley (chopped) 1/2 lemon (juiced) 1.5 Tbsp butter (melted) 1 Tbsp olive oil 1/2 tsp salt 1/4 tsp pepper 1/2 tsp garlic powder 1/4 cup grated Parmigiano Reggiano 4 thin lemon slices Directions Preheat oven to 400F.
